#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,i,j,k,len;
    char alphabets[27]={'a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','j','k','l','m','n','o','p','q','r','s','t','u','v','w','x','y','z','\0'};
    
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d",&k);
              j=k%25;
              if(j!=0)
              {
              for(i=j;i>=0;i--)
              {
                  printf("%c",alphabets[i]);
              }
              }
              k=k/25;
		while(k--)
		for(i=25;i>=0;i--)
		printf("%c",alphabets[i]);
		printf("\n");
             
    }
    
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
